# penguin_tencentcloud_elastic_ip (Resource)

Manage Tencent Cloud elastic IPs via the Penguin service. Note: the Penguin API currently has no read endpoint for EIPs, so refresh cannot detect out-of-band changes.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "penguin_tencentcloud_elastic_ip" "example" {
  region               = "ap-guangzhou"
  bandwidth_limit_mbps = 20
  address_name         = "prod-eip-01"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address_name` (String)
- `bandwidth_limit_mbps` (Number)
- `region` (String)

### Optional

- `shared_bandwidth_package_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `address` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
